column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday August 7 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Bert T Combs Mountain Pkwy between Exit 10 and I-64:
column4: The westbound direction toward I-64 is shutdown due to a dump truck that lost a load of coal on I-64.

column3: Bert T Combs Mountain Pkwy between Exit 10 and I-64:
column4: Motorists must use Exit 10 to Hwy 15 to Winchester.

column3: Bert T Combs Mountain Pkwy between Exit 10 and I-64:
column4: All lanes on I-64 are open.
